sqlMap.select: select * from CATEGORY where parentId = 0 order by name
select * from CATEGORY where parentId = #parentId# order by name
select * from CATEGORY where name = #name# and parentId = #parentId#

select CATEGORY.id, CATEGORY.name, CATEGORY.parentId, CATEGORY.deleted FROM ( select CATEGORY.*, CATEGORY.NAME AS FIRST, '' as SECOND from CATEGORY WHERE deleted = 0 and parentId = 0 UNION select SUBCATEGORY.*, CATEGORY.NAME AS FIRST, SUBCATEGORY.NAME AS SECOND from (SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE parentId != 0 and deleted = 0) SUBCATEGORY, (SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE parentId = 0 and deleted = 0) CATEGORY WHERE SUBCATEGORY.parentId = CATEGORY.id order by FIRST, SECOND) CATEGORY;
select * from CATEGORY WHERE deleted = 0 order by name
sqlMap.update: update CATEGORY set name = #name#, deleted = #deleted#, orderNumber = #orderNumber# where ID = #id#
update CATEGORY set deleted = 1 where id = #id#
